Player History
Injured on 4/23/1966 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/8/1967 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Drafted in 4th round, 69th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1973...
Injured on 4/14/1975 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/23/1979, off Dave Lemonds (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/28/1979, off Dennis Martinez (PIT)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 4 runs on 8/12/1980...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis on 8/16/1981...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 5/2/1982...
Drove in 7 runs against San Francisco on 9/5/1982...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Houston on 6/1/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1983, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 6/20/1984...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 7/23/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1985, hitting .423 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/4/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $4,225,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/13/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $4,225,000 per year...
Released by Texas on 2/20/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/22/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $4,750,000 per year...
